tools.name: TRELLO_ADD_BOARDS
tools.description: Creates a new Trello board; the 'name' parameter is required for creation, and various preferences can be customized or cloned from a source board.

desc.title: Desc
desc.description: Description for the Trello board (0-16384 characters).

name.title: Name
name.description: Name for the new Trello board (1-16384 characters). This field is required for board creation.

closed.title: Closed
closed.description: Whether the board should be immediately archived (closed).

subscribed.title: Subscribed
subscribed.description: Whether the creator is automatically subscribed to the board.

prefs_voting.title: Prefs Voting
prefs_voting.description: Who can vote on cards ('disabled', 'members', 'observers', 'org', 'public'); corresponds to API parameter 'prefs_voting'.

idBoardSource.title: Id Board Source
idBoardSource.description: ID of an existing Trello board to use as a template.

prefs__voting.title: Prefs  Voting
prefs__voting.description: Who can vote on cards ('disabled', 'members', 'observers', 'org', 'public'); corresponds to API parameter 'prefs/voting'.

idOrganization.title: Id Organization
idOrganization.description: ID or name of the Trello Workspace (formerly Organization) for this board.

keepFromSource.title: Keep From Source
keepFromSource.description: Components to copy if 'idBoardSource' is used (e.g., 'cards,labels', 'all'; valid: 'cards', 'lists', 'checklists', 'stickers', 'members', 'customFields', 'prefs', 'labels').

prefs_comments.title: Prefs Comments
prefs_comments.description: Who can comment on cards ('disabled', 'members', 'observers', 'org', 'public'); corresponds to API parameter 'prefs_comments'.

prefs_selfJoin.title: Prefs Self Join
prefs_selfJoin.description: Whether Workspace members can join the board themselves; corresponds to API parameter 'prefs_selfJoin'.

labelNames__red.title: Label Names  Red
labelNames__red.description: Name for the red label (0-16384 characters); corresponds to API parameter 'labelNames/red'.

prefs__comments.title: Prefs  Comments
prefs__comments.description: Who can comment on cards ('disabled', 'members', 'observers', 'org', 'public'); corresponds to API parameter 'prefs/comments'.

prefs__selfJoin.title: Prefs  Self Join
prefs__selfJoin.description: Whether Workspace members can join the board themselves; corresponds to API parameter 'prefs/selfJoin'.

prefs_cardAging.title: Prefs Card Aging
prefs_cardAging.description: Card aging style ('pirate' or 'regular'); corresponds to API parameter 'prefs_cardAging'.

labelNames__blue.title: Label Names  Blue
labelNames__blue.description: Name for the blue label (0-16384 characters); corresponds to API parameter 'labelNames/blue'.

prefs__cardAging.title: Prefs  Card Aging
prefs__cardAging.description: Card aging style ('pirate' or 'regular'); corresponds to API parameter 'prefs/cardAging'.

prefs_background.title: Prefs Background
prefs_background.description: Board background (standard name, custom ID, or hex code; 0-16384 characters); corresponds to API parameter 'prefs_background'.

prefs_cardCovers.title: Prefs Card Covers
prefs_cardCovers.description: Whether card covers are shown; corresponds to API parameter 'prefs_cardCovers'.

labelNames__green.title: Label Names  Green
labelNames__green.description: Name for the green label (0-16384 characters); corresponds to API parameter 'labelNames/green'.

prefs__background.title: Prefs  Background
prefs__background.description: Board background (standard name like 'blue', 'pink', or custom ID); corresponds to API parameter 'prefs/background'.

prefs__cardCovers.title: Prefs  Card Covers
prefs__cardCovers.description: Whether card covers are shown; corresponds to API parameter 'prefs/cardCovers'.

prefs_invitations.title: Prefs Invitations
prefs_invitations.description: Who can invite to the board ('admins' or 'members'); corresponds to API parameter 'prefs_invitations'.

labelNames__orange.title: Label Names  Orange
labelNames__orange.description: Name for the orange label (0-16384 characters); corresponds to API parameter 'labelNames/orange'.

labelNames__purple.title: Label Names  Purple
labelNames__purple.description: Name for the purple label (0-16384 characters); corresponds to API parameter 'labelNames/purple'.

labelNames__yellow.title: Label Names  Yellow
labelNames__yellow.description: Name for the yellow label (0-16384 characters); corresponds to API parameter 'labelNames/yellow'.

prefs__invitations.title: Prefs  Invitations
prefs__invitations.description: Who can invite to the board ('admins' or 'members'); corresponds to API parameter 'prefs/invitations'.

prefs_permissionLevel.title: Prefs Permission Level
prefs_permissionLevel.description: Board visibility and permission level ('org', 'private', 'public'); corresponds to API parameter 'prefs_permissionLevel'.

prefs__permissionLevel.title: Prefs  Permission Level
prefs__permissionLevel.description: Board visibility and permission level ('org', 'private', 'public'); corresponds to API parameter 'prefs/permissionLevel'.

prefs__calendarFeedEnabled.title: Prefs  Calendar Feed Enabled
prefs__calendarFeedEnabled.description: Whether the calendar feed is enabled; corresponds to API parameter 'prefs/calendarFeedEnabled'.

tools.name: TRELLO_ADD_BOARDS_CALENDAR_KEY_GENERATE_BY_ID_BOARD
tools.description: Generates a new calendar key for the Trello board specified by `idBoard`, invalidating any previous key for that board.

idBoard.title: Id Board
idBoard.description: The unique identifier of the Trello board for which to generate a calendar key.

tools.name: TRELLO_ADD_BOARDS_CHECKLISTS_BY_ID_BOARD
tools.description: Creates a new, initially empty checklist with a given name on an existing Trello card. Checklists are created on cards, not boards.

inputSchema.title: AddBoardsChecklistsByIdBoardRequest

name.title: Name
name.description: Name for the new checklist (1-16384 characters).

idCard.title: Id Card
idCard.description: The unique identifier of the Trello card to which the new checklist will be added. Checklists are created on cards, not boards.

inputSchema.description: Request model for creating a new checklist on a Trello card.

tools.name: TRELLO_ADD_BOARDS_EMAIL_KEY_GENERATE_BY_ID_BOARD
tools.description: Generates a new email key for the Trello board specified by idBoard to enable or reset adding cards via email; this invalidates any previously existing email key for the board.

idBoard.title: Id Board
idBoard.description: The unique identifier of the Trello board for which a new email key will be generated.

tools.name: TRELLO_ADD_BOARDS_LABELS_BY_ID_BOARD
tools.description: Creates a new label on an existing Trello board.

name.title: Name
name.description: The name for the new label. Must be a string with a length from 0 to 16384 characters. An empty string is allowed.

color.title: Color
color.description: The color for the new label. Provide a valid Trello label color name or null for no color. If not provided, Trello may assign a default color or no color.

idBoard.title: Id Board
idBoard.description: The ID of the board to which the new label will be added.

tools.name: TRELLO_ADD_BOARDS_LISTS_BY_ID_BOARD
tools.description: Creates a new, empty list on a specified, existing Trello board, typically used as a column or category for organizing cards.

pos.title: Pos
pos.description: The position of the new list on the board. Valid values are 'top', 'bottom', or a positive number (e.g., 1, 2.5, 3). If not provided, the list is added to the bottom.

name.title: Name
name.description: The name for the new list. Must be a string with a length from 1 to 16384 characters.

idBoard.title: Id Board
idBoard.description: The ID of the board to which the new list will be added.

tools.name: TRELLO_ADD_BOARDS_MARK_AS_VIEWED_BY_ID_BOARD
tools.description: Marks the Trello board specified by idBoard as viewed for the current user, exclusively updating its viewed status and potentially influencing its position in user-specific lists and notification settings.

idBoard.title: Id Board
idBoard.description: The unique identifier of the Trello board to be marked as viewed.

tools.name: TRELLO_ADD_BOARDS_POWER_UPS_BY_ID_BOARD
tools.description: Enables the Power-Up specified by the 'value' parameter on the board; processes one Power-Up enablement per call.

inputSchema.title: AddBoardsPowerUpsByIdBoardRequest

value.title: Value
value.description: Identifier for the built-in Trello Power-Up to enable (e.g., 'calendar', 'cardAging', 'recap', 'voting'). Only Trello's built-in Power-Ups are supported.

idBoard.title: Id Board
idBoard.description: The ID of the Trello board.

inputSchema.description: Request schema for enabling a specific Power-Up on a Trello board.

tools.name: TRELLO_ADD_CARDS
tools.description: Creates a new card in a Trello list; `idList` is required, and if `idCardSource` is used, the source card must be accessible.

due.title: Due
due.description: Due date for the card (date string or 'null' to remove).

pos.title: Pos
pos.description: Position in list: 'top', 'bottom', or a positive float.

desc.title: Desc
examples: This is a sample card description.

name.title: Name
name.description: Name for the new card; required unless `idCardSource` or `urlSource` is used.

idList.title: Id List
idList.description: Required ID of the list to add the card to.

labels.title: Labels
labels.description: Comma-separated label colors (e.g., 'blue', 'green') or 'all' for default labels.

idBoard.title: Id Board
idBoard.description: ID of the board to move the card to; if specified, `idList` must be on this board.

idLabels.title: Id Labels
idLabels.description: Comma-separated list of label IDs (24-char hex) to add.

idMembers.title: Id Members
idMembers.description: Comma-separated list of member IDs (24-char hex) to assign.

urlSource.title: Url Source
urlSource.description: URL (http:// or https://) to attach; if a Trello card URL, copies that card. Use 'null' if not needed.

fileSource.title: File Source
fileSource.description: Binary data of a file to attach.

subscribed.title: Subscribed
subscribed.description: Subscribe user to the card. Valid values: 'true', 'false'.

idCardSource.title: Id Card Source
idCardSource.description: ID of an existing card to copy.

keepFromSource.title: Keep From Source
keepFromSource.description: If using `idCardSource`, properties to copy: 'all' or comma-separated (e.g., 'attachments', 'checklists', 'due').

idAttachmentCover.title: Id Attachment Cover
idAttachmentCover.description: ID of an image attachment on this card for its cover, or 'null' for no cover.

tools.name: TRELLO_ADD_CARDS_ACTIONS_COMMENTS_BY_ID_CARD
tools.description: Adds a new text comment, which can include @mentions, to a Trello card specified by its ID; file attachments are not supported via this action.

text.title: Text
examples: What's the status on this task? @username
text.description: Comment text, between 1 and 16384 characters. Supports @mentions to notify Trello users.

idCard.title: Id Card
idCard.description: ID or shortLink of the Trello card to add the comment to.

tools.name: TRELLO_ADD_CARDS_ATTACHMENTS_BY_ID_CARD
tools.description: Adds an attachment to a Trello card by `idCard`; specify either a `file` to upload or a `url` to link, but not both.

url.title: Url
url.description: URL of an external resource to attach if not uploading a `file`. Must start with 'http://' or 'https://'.

file.title: File
file.description: Path to the local file to attach if not linking a `url`.

name.title: Name
name.description: Desired name for the attachment. If omitted, Trello uses the original filename or a URL-derived default. Max length 256.

idCard.title: Id Card
idCard.description: ID or shortLink of the Trello card.

mimeType.title: Mime Type
mimeType.description: MIME type of the attachment, aiding Trello in file handling. Max length 256.

tools.name: TRELLO_ADD_CARDS_CHECKLIST_CHECK_ITEM_BY_ID_CARD_BY_ID_CHECKLIST
tools.description: Adds a new check item to an existing checklist on a specific Trello card.

inputSchema.title: AddCardsChecklistCheckItemByIdCardByIdChecklistRequest

pos.title: Pos
pos.description: The position of the new check item within the checklist. Valid values are 'top', 'bottom', or a positive number (e.g., '1', '2.5').

name.title: Name
name.description: The name of the check item to be created. Must be a string with a length between 1 and 16384 characters.

idCard.title: Id Card
idCard.description: The ID or short link of the card where the checklist resides.

idChecklist.title: Id Checklist
idChecklist.description: The ID of the checklist to which the new check item will be added.

inputSchema.description: Request schema for adding a check item to a checklist on a Trello card.

tools.name: TRELLO_ADD_CARDS_CHECKLISTS_BY_ID_CARD
tools.description: Adds a checklist to a Trello card: use `value` to add a specific existing checklist, `idChecklistSource` to create a new checklist by copying an existing one (optionally using `name` for the new checklist's name), or `name` to create a new empty checklist from scratch.

name.title: Name
name.description: The name for the new checklist. Used when creating a new checklist from scratch or when copying from `idChecklistSource`. If `value` specifies an existing checklist ID to add, this `name` is ignored. String with a length from 0 to 16384 characters.

value.title: Value
value.description: The ID of a pre-existing checklist to add directly to the card. If an ID is provided here, that specific checklist is added. If `null` or omitted, a new checklist will be created on the card (either empty using `name`, or by copying from `idChecklistSource`).

idCard.title: Id Card
idCard.description: The ID or shortLink of the card to which the checklist will be added.

idChecklistSource.title: Id Checklist Source
idChecklistSource.description: The ID of an existing checklist to copy. If provided (and `value` is not an ID of an existing checklist to add), a new checklist is created on the card by duplicating this source checklist. The `name` parameter can be used to specify a name for the newly created checklist.

tools.name: TRELLO_ADD_CARDS_ID_LABELS_BY_ID_CARD
tools.description: Adds an existing label to a Trello card; `idCard` identifies the card and `value` is the ID of the label to add. Both card and label must already exist.

value.title: Value
value.description: The ID of the label to add. Label IDs are typically 24-character hexadecimal strings.

idCard.title: Id Card
idCard.description: The ID or shortLink of the Trello card. Card IDs are typically 24-character hexadecimal strings.

tools.name: TRELLO_ADD_CARDS_ID_MEMBERS_BY_ID_CARD
tools.description: Assigns a Trello member to a specific Trello card by card ID (or short link) and member ID.

inputSchema.title: AddCardsIdMembersByIdCardRequest

value.title: Value
value.description: The ID of the Trello member to be added to the card.

idCard.title: Id Card
idCard.description: The ID or short link of the Trello card to which the member will be added.

inputSchema.description: Request schema for adding a member to a Trello card.

tools.name: TRELLO_ADD_CARDS_LABELS_BY_ID_CARD
tools.description: Adds a label to an existing Trello card (specified by `idCard`), defining the label by `name` and either `color` or the overriding `value` (which specifies color by name); a new label is created on the board if a matching one (by name/color combination) doesn't already exist.

inputSchema.title: AddCardsLabelsByIdCardRequest

name.title: Name
name.description: Name for the label (0-16384 chars). If omitted, color name may be used. If a label with this name exists on the board, it's used; otherwise, a new label with this name and specified color is created.

color.title: Color
color.description: Label color name (e.g., 'green', 'yellow', 'null'). Used if 'value' is not provided. If 'name' matches an existing label, its color can be updated by this field.

value.title: Value
value.description: Alternative way to specify the label's color by name (e.g., 'yellow', 'green,purple', 'all'); consult Trello for interpretation of lists or 'all'. Overrides 'color' parameter if both are provided.

idCard.title: Id Card
idCard.description: ID or shortlink of the card.

inputSchema.description: Request for adding a label to a Trello card.

tools.name: TRELLO_ADD_CARDS_MEMBERS_VOTED_BY_ID_CARD
tools.description: Casts a 'yes' vote for a specified member on a Trello card; a member can only vote once per card.

value.title: Value
value.description: The ID of the member to cast a 'yes' vote on the card. For example, `600f0c000000000000000000`.

idCard.title: Id Card
idCard.description: The ID or short link of the card to add the vote to. For example, `FY2OWrnc` or `571d07b591c8b68aeb4f6acc`.

tools.name: TRELLO_ADD_CARDS_STICKERS_BY_ID_CARD
tools.description: Adds a sticker to a Trello card, using a default sticker name (e.g., 'taco-cool') or a custom sticker ID for the image, and allows specifying its position, rotation, and z-index.

top.title: Top
top.description: Vertical offset from card's top edge (pixels). Uses default position if omitted.

left.title: Left
left.description: Horizontal offset from card's left edge (pixels). Uses default position if omitted.

image.title: Image
image.description: Name of a default Trello sticker (e.g., 'taco-cool'), ID of a previously uploaded custom sticker. Length: 0-16384 chars. Uses default if omitted.

idCard.title: Id Card
idCard.description: ID or short link of the card.

rotate.title: Rotate
rotate.description: Rotation angle in degrees; positive rotates clockwise. Defaults to 0 if omitted.

zIndex.title: Z Index
zIndex.description: Stacking order (z-index); higher values are on top. Must be an integer. Trello assigns a default layer if omitted.

tools.name: TRELLO_ADD_CHECKLISTS
tools.description: Creates a new checklist on a Trello card, either by name or by copying from `idChecklistSource`, targeting an `idCard` or `idBoard`; this action creates only the checklist structure, not its items.

inputSchema.title: AddChecklistsRequest

pos.title: Pos
pos.description: The position of the new checklist on its card. Accepted values are 'top', 'bottom', or a positive number (integer or float).

name.title: Name
name.description: The name for the new checklist. Required if `idChecklistSource` is not provided. Must be a string with length between 0 and 16384 characters.

idCard.title: Id Card
idCard.description: The ID of the Trello card to which the checklist will be added. If provided, the checklist is added to this specific card. One of `idBoard` or `idCard` is required.

idBoard.title: Id Board
idBoard.description: The ID of the Trello board. If `idCard` is not specified, this board will be targeted, potentially for creating a new card to host the checklist. One of `idBoard` or `idCard` is required.

idChecklistSource.title: Id Checklist Source
idChecklistSource.description: The ID of an existing checklist to be copied. If provided, the `name` parameter is ignored, and the new checklist will be a duplicate of this source.

inputSchema.description: Parameters to create a new Trello checklist, including target card/board, optional source for copying, name (if not copying), and position.

tools.name: TRELLO_ADD_CHECKLISTS_CHECK_ITEMS_BY_ID_CHECKLIST
tools.description: Adds a new check item to a specified Trello checklist; this action does not update existing check items.

inputSchema.title: AddChecklistsCheckItemsByIdChecklistRequest

pos.title: Pos
pos.description: Position for the new check item: 'top', 'bottom', or a positive number. Defaults to bottom.

name.title: Name
name.description: Name for the new check item (1-16384 characters).

checked.title: Checked
checked.description: Initial completion status: 'true' or 'false'. Defaults to unchecked.

idChecklist.title: Id Checklist
idChecklist.description: ID of the checklist to add the new check item to.

inputSchema.description: Parameters to create a new check item on a checklist.

tools.name: TRELLO_ADD_LABELS
tools.description: Creates a new label with a specified name (required) and color on a Trello board (idBoard required); this action defines the label but does not apply it to cards.

name.title: Name
name.description: Name for the new label (0-16384 characters). **Required by the Trello API.** An empty string creates a color-only visual label.

color.title: Color
color.description: Color for the new label. Trello may assign a default color if unspecified or invalid.

idBoard.title: Id Board
idBoard.description: ID of the board for the new label. **Required by the Trello API.** The board must exist and be accessible.

tools.name: TRELLO_ADD_LISTS
tools.description: Creates a new list on a specified Trello board, with options to copy an existing list, set its position, initial state (archived/subscribed), and does not modify existing lists or move cards.

inputSchema.title: AddListsRequest

pos.title: Pos
pos.description: The position of the new list on the board. Valid values are `top`, `bottom`, or a positive number (e.g., '1', '2.5').

name.title: Name
name.description: The name for the new list. Must be a string with a length from 1 to 16384 characters. This is a required parameter.

closed.title: Closed
closed.description: Indicates whether the list should be created as closed (archived). Set to `true` for closed, or `false` for open.

idBoard.title: Id Board
idBoard.description: The ID of the board to which the new list should be added. This is a required parameter.

subscribed.title: Subscribed
subscribed.description: Indicates whether the user creating the list should be automatically subscribed to it. Set to `true` to subscribe, or `false` otherwise.

idListSource.title: Id List Source
idListSource.description: The ID of an existing list to copy when creating the new list. If provided, the new list will be a copy of this source list.

inputSchema.description: Request schema for creating a new list on a Trello board.

tools.name: TRELLO_ADD_LISTS_ARCHIVE_ALL_CARDS_BY_ID_LIST
tools.description: Archives all cards in a Trello list; while cards can be restored via the Trello interface, this action does not provide an unarchive function.

idList.title: Id List
idList.description: The unique identifier of the Trello list from which all cards will be archived.

tools.name: TRELLO_ADD_LISTS_CARDS_BY_ID_LIST
tools.description: Creates a new card in a Trello list, which must be specified by an existing and accessible `idList`.

inputSchema.title: AddListsCardsByIdListRequest

due.title: Due
due.description: The due date for the new card, in ISO 8601 format (e.g., 'YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS.SSSZ') or null if no due date is set.

desc.title: Desc
desc.description: The description for the new card. A string with a length from 0 to 16384 characters.

name.title: Name
examples: Schedule team meeting for next week
name.description: The name for the new card. A string with a length from 1 to 16384 characters. While optional, providing a name is highly recommended.

idList.title: Id List
idList.description: The ID of the Trello list where the new card will be created.

labels.title: Labels
labels.description: A comma-separated list of label colors to apply to the card. Valid colors: blue, green, orange, purple, red, yellow. Alternatively, 'all' can be used to apply all available label colors on the board.

idMembers.title: Id Members
idMembers.description: A comma-separated list of member IDs (24-character hex strings) to assign to the new card.

inputSchema.description: Defines the parameters for creating a new card in a specific Trello list.

tools.name: TRELLO_ADD_LISTS_MOVE_ALL_CARDS_BY_ID_LIST
tools.description: Moves all cards from a Trello list to a *different* board; this action is irreversible, moves (not copies) cards, and empties the source list without deleting it.

idList.title: Id List
idList.description: The ID of the source Trello list from which all cards will be moved.

idBoard.title: Id Board
idBoard.description: The ID of the destination Trello board to which all cards from the source list will be moved. This parameter is required by Trello for this operation.

tools.name: TRELLO_ADD_MEMBERS_AVATAR_BY_ID_MEMBER
tools.description: Updates a Trello member's avatar using a base64-encoded image; the `file` field, though schema-optional, requires valid image data for a successful update.

file.title: File
file.description: Base64-encoded string of the new avatar image (e.g., PNG, JPEG). Although schema-optional, a valid image string is required for successful avatar update.

idMember.title: Id Member
idMember.description: The ID or username of the Trello member.

tools.name: TRELLO_ADD_MEMBERS_BOARD_BACKGROUNDS_BY_ID_MEMBER
tools.description: Adds a new custom board background, from an image file, to a specified Trello member's collection, making it available for their use but not applying it to any board.

file.title: File
file.description: The image file to be uploaded for the board background. This is typically a file path or a URL accessible by the system performing the upload.

tile.title: Tile
tile.description: Determines whether the background image should be tiled. Set to 'true' to tile the image or 'false' to display it as a single image.

idMember.title: Id Member
idMember.description: The ID or username of the Trello member.

brightness.title: Brightness
brightness.description: Specifies the brightness of the background. Valid values are 'dark', 'light', or 'unknown'.

tools.name: TRELLO_ADD_MEMBERS_BOARD_STARS_BY_ID_MEMBER
tools.description: Stars a Trello board for a member (does not remove or list stars), optionally at a specified position; the board must exist and be accessible to the member.

pos.title: Pos
pos.description: The desired position for the new board star in the member's list of starred boards. Valid values are 'top', 'bottom', or a positive integer.

idBoard.title: Id Board
idBoard.description: The ID of the Trello board to be starred. The board must exist and be accessible to the specified member.

idMember.title: Id Member
idMember.description: The ID or username of the Trello member for whom the board star will be added.

tools.name: TRELLO_ADD_MEMBERS_CUSTOM_BOARD_BACKGROUNDS_BY_ID_MEMBER
tools.description: Adds a new custom board background for a specified Trello member; the `file` parameter (image data) is required.

file.title: File
file.description: Base64 encoded image data for the custom board background.

tile.title: Tile
tile.description: Indicates whether the custom board background image should be tiled. Set to 'true' to enable tiling, or 'false' to disable it.

idMember.title: Id Member
idMember.description: The ID or username of the Trello member for whom the custom board background will be added.

brightness.title: Brightness
brightness.description: Specifies the brightness setting for the custom board background. Accepted values are 'dark', 'light', or 'unknown'.

tools.name: TRELLO_ADD_MEMBERS_CUSTOM_EMOJI_BY_ID_MEMBER
tools.description: Adds a new custom emoji using an image file and a unique name to a Trello member's account; this emoji is member-specific and not shared across the workspace.

inputSchema.title: AddMembersCustomEmojiByIdMemberRequest

file.title: File
file.description: Emoji image file to upload. Must adhere to Trello's image format and size guidelines. Sent as multipart/form-data.

name.title: Name
name.description: Unique name for the custom emoji (2-64 characters).

idMember.title: Id Member
idMember.description: ID or username of the member.

inputSchema.description: Parameters to add a custom emoji for a Trello member.

tools.name: TRELLO_ADD_MEMBERS_CUSTOM_STICKERS_BY_ID_MEMBER
tools.description: Uploads a custom sticker to a Trello member's collection, if the member's plan allows custom stickers and respects associated limits.

file.title: File
file.description: The sticker file to upload. Trello recommends images to be 128x128 pixels for optimal display. Ensure the file format is supported by Trello (e.g., PNG, JPG).

idMember.title: Id Member
idMember.description: The ID or username of the Trello member to whom the custom sticker will be added. The member must exist.

tools.name: TRELLO_ADD_MEMBERS_SAVED_SEARCHES_BY_ID_MEMBER
tools.description: Creates a new saved search with a specified name, position, and query for a Trello member.

inputSchema.title: AddMembersSavedSearchesByIdMemberRequest

pos.title: Pos
pos.description: The position of the saved search in the member's list of saved searches. Can be 'top', 'bottom', or a positive numerical value.

name.title: Name
name.description: The name for the saved search. Must be a non-empty string with at least one non-space character.

query.title: Query
query.description: The search query string to be saved. The string must have a length between 1 and 16384 characters.

idMember.title: Id Member
idMember.description: The ID or username of the Trello member for whom the saved search will be created.

inputSchema.description: Request schema for creating a new saved search for a Trello member.

tools.name: TRELLO_ADD_NOTIFICATIONS_ALL_READ

tools.name: TRELLO_ADD_ORGANIZATIONS
tools.description: Creates a new Trello organization (Workspace) with a `displayName` (required), and optionally a description, website, and various preferences (e.g., board visibility, member invitation restrictions).

desc.title: Desc
examples: This is the main marketing team for ACME Corp.
desc.description: The description for the organization. Max length: 16384 characters.

name.title: Name
name.description: The unique, URL-friendly programmatic name for the organization. Must be lowercase, start with a letter, and contain only lowercase letters, numbers, and underscores. Max length: 16384 characters. If not provided, Trello will generate one based on the displayName.

website.title: Website
website.description: The URL of the organization's website. Must start with 'http://' or 'https://'. Can be null or an empty string if no website.

displayName.title: Display Name
displayName.description: The human-readable name for the organization. Min length: 1 character. Cannot begin or end with a space. This field is required.

prefs__permissionLevel.title: Prefs  Permission Level
prefs__permissionLevel.description: The default permission level for new boards created within the organization. Allowed values: 'private' or 'public'.

prefs__associatedDomain.title: Prefs  Associated Domain
prefs__associatedDomain.description: The Google Workspace (formerly G Suite) domain to associate with the organization. This enables features like restricting membership to users from this domain.

prefs__googleAppsVersion.title: Prefs  Google Apps Version
prefs__googleAppsVersion.description: The version of Google Workspace integration. Allowed values: '1' or '2'.

prefs__orgInviteRestrict.title: Prefs  Org Invite Restrict
prefs__orgInviteRestrict.description: Specifies restrictions on who can be invited to the organization, e.g., a comma-separated list of email domains ('@example.com,@mycompany.com') or specific email addresses. If not set, any Trello user can be invited.

prefs__externalMembersDisabled.title: Prefs  External Members Disabled
prefs__externalMembersDisabled.description: Determines if external members (guests) are disabled for the organization. Set to 'true' to disable, 'false' to enable.

prefs__boardVisibilityRestrict__org.title: Prefs  Board Visibility Restrict  Org
prefs__boardVisibilityRestrict__org.description: Controls creation of organization-visible boards. Allowed values: 'admin' (only admins can create), 'none' (cannot be created), 'org' (any member can create).

prefs__boardVisibilityRestrict__public.title: Prefs  Board Visibility Restrict  Public
prefs__boardVisibilityRestrict__public.description: Controls creation of public boards. Allowed values: 'admin' (only admins can create), 'none' (cannot be created), 'org' (any member can create).

prefs__boardVisibilityRestrict__private.title: Prefs  Board Visibility Restrict  Private
prefs__boardVisibilityRestrict__private.description: Controls creation of private boards. Allowed values: 'admin' (only admins can create), 'none' (cannot be created), 'org' (any member can create).

urls.description: A comma-separated string of Trello API v1 GET routes to be executed in a single batch request. Each route must be relative to the `/1` Trello API base (e.g., `/cards/{idCard}`, `/boards/{idBoard}/lists`) and should not include the `/1` prefix in the individual routes. Trello typically limits this to a maximum of 10 routes per batch call.

inputSchema.description: Defines the parameters for making a batch GET request to the Trello API.

tools.name: TRELLO_GET_BOARDS_ACTIONS_BY_ID_BOARD
tools.description: Retrieves actions (e.g., card creations, comments) for a Trello board by its ID, useful for activity tracking; the board must exist.

page.title: Page
page.description: The page number of results to retrieve. Note: `page * limit` must be less than 1000. Used for pagination.

limit.title: Limit
limit.description: The maximum number of actions to return. Must be a number between 0 and 1000, inclusive.

since.title: Since
since.description: Return actions that occurred after this date, or use 'lastView' to get actions since the user last viewed the board. Can also be null. Dates should be in ISO 8601 format or a valid Trello date string.

before.title: Before
before.description: Return actions that occurred before this date. Can be null. Dates should be in ISO 8601 format or a valid Trello date string.

fields.title: Fields
fields.description: Specifies which action fields to return. Use 'all' for all fields, or provide a comma-separated list of field names. Supported fields include: data, date, idMemberCreator, or type.

filter.title: Filter
filter.description: A filter to return only specific types of actions. Use 'all' for all actions, or provide a comma-separated list of action types. Supported types include: addAttachmentToCard, addChecklistToCard, addMemberToBoard, addMemberToCard, addMemberToOrganization, addToOrganizationBoard, commentCard, convertToCardFromCheckItem, copyBoard, copyCard, copyCommentCard, createBoard, createCard, createList, createOrganization, deleteAttachmentFromCard, deleteBoardInvitation, deleteCard, deleteOrganizationInvitation, disablePowerUp, emailCard, enablePowerUp, makeAdminOfBoard, makeNormalMemberOfBoard, makeNormalMemberOfOrganization, makeObserverOfBoard, memberJoinedTrello, moveCardFromBoard, moveCardToBoard, moveListFromBoard, moveListToBoard, removeChecklistFromCard, removeFromOrganizationBoard, removeMemberFromCard, unconfirmedBoardInvitation, unconfirmedOrganizationInvitation, updateBoard, updateCard, updateCard:closed, updateCard:desc, updateCard:idList, updateCard:name, updateCheckItemStateOnCard, updateChecklist, updateList, updateList:closed, updateList:name, updateMember, or updateOrganization.

format.title: Format
format.description: The format of the returned actions. Valid options are 'count' (returns only the count of actions), 'list' (returns detailed actions), or 'minimal' (returns a minimal representation of actions).

member.title: Member
member.description: Includes member details in the action data if 'true'.

display.title: Display
display.description: Includes display-friendly information for entities in the response if 'true'.

idBoard.title: Id Board
idBoard.description: The ID of the Trello board for which to retrieve actions.

entities.title: Entities
entities.description: Includes related entities (e.g., cards, lists, members) in the response if 'true'.

idModels.title: Id Models
idModels.description: A comma-separated list of model IDs (e.g., card IDs, list IDs) to filter actions by. Only actions related to these models will be returned.

memberCreator.title: Member Creator
memberCreator.description: Includes details of the member who created the action if 'true'.

member_fields.title: Member Fields
member_fields.description: Specifies which fields of the member object to return if 'member' is true. Use 'all' for all member fields, or provide a comma-separated list. Supported fields include: avatarHash, bio, bioData, confirmed, fullName, idPremOrgsAdmin, initials, memberType, products, status, url, or username.

memberCreator_fields.title: Member Creator Fields
memberCreator_fields.description: Specifies which fields of the memberCreator object to return if 'memberCreator' is true. Use 'all' for all fields, or provide a comma-separated list. Supported fields include: avatarHash, bio, bioData, confirmed, fullName, idPremOrgsAdmin, initials, memberType, products, status, url, or username.

tools.name: TRELLO_GET_BOARDS_BOARD_STARS_BY_ID_BOARD
tools.description: Retrieves board stars (user-marked favorites) for a specified Trello board, where `idBoard` must be an existing board; use to list a user's starred boards or all stars on a particular board.

filter.title: Filter
filter.description: Filter for board stars: 'mine' for the current user's stars (default), or 'none' for all stars on the board.

idBoard.title: Id Board
idBoard.description: The unique identifier of the Trello board.

tools.name: TRELLO_GET_BOARDS_BY_ID_BOARD
tools.description: Fetches comprehensive details for a specific Trello board by its ID; this is a read-only action.

inputSchema.title: GetBoardsByIdBoardRequest

cards.title: Cards
cards.description: Filters the cards to be returned. Valid values: 'all', 'closed', 'none', 'open', or 'visible'.

lists.title: Lists
lists.description: Filters the lists on the board to be returned. Valid values: 'all', 'closed', 'none', or 'open'.

fields.title: Fields
fields.default: name, desc, descData, closed, idOrganization, pinned, url, shortUrl, prefs and labelNames
fields.description: Specifies the fields to return for the board object itself. Use 'all' or a comma-separated list. Valid fields: closed, dateLastActivity, dateLastView, desc, descData, idOrganization, invitations, invited, labelNames, memberships, name, pinned, powerUps, prefs, shortLink, shortUrl, starred, subscribed, url.

labels.title: Labels
labels.description: Filters the labels to be returned. Valid values: 'all' or 'none'.

actions.title: Actions
actions.description: Filters the actions to be returned. Specify 'all' or provide a comma-separated list of action types. Valid types include: addAttachmentToCard, addChecklistToCard, addMemberToBoard, addMemberToCard, addMemberToOrganization, addToOrganizationBoard, commentCard, convertToCardFromCheckItem, copyBoard, copyCard, copyCommentCard, createBoard, createCard, createList, createOrganization, deleteAttachmentFromCard, deleteBoardInvitation, deleteCard, deleteOrganizationInvitation, disablePowerUp, emailCard, enablePowerUp, makeAdminOfBoard, makeNormalMemberOfBoard, makeNormalMemberOfOrganization, makeObserverOfBoard, memberJoinedTrello, moveCardFromBoard, moveCardToBoard, moveListFromBoard, moveListToBoard, removeChecklistFromCard, removeFromOrganizationBoard, removeMemberFromCard, unconfirmedBoardInvitation, unconfirmedOrganizationInvitation, updateBoard, updateCard, updateCard:closed, updateCard:desc, updateCard:idList, updateCard:name, updateCheckItemStateOnCard, updateChecklist, updateList, updateList:closed, updateList:name, updateMember, or updateOrganization.

idBoard.title: Id Board
idBoard.description: The unique identifier of the Trello board.

members.title: Members
members.description: Filters the members of the board to be returned. Valid values: 'admins', 'all', 'none', 'normal', or 'owners'.

myPrefs.title: My Prefs
myPrefs.description: Determines whether to include the current user's preferences for this board. Set to 'true' or 'false'.

boardStars.title: Board Stars
boardStars.description: Filters board stars. Valid values: 'mine' (stars by the current user) or 'none'.

checklists.title: Checklists
checklists.description: Filters board-level checklists to be returned. Valid values: 'all' or 'none'.

card_fields.title: Card Fields
card_fields.description: Specifies the fields to return for card objects. Use 'all' or a comma-separated list. Valid fields: badges, checkItemStates, closed, dateLastActivity, desc, descData, due, email, idAttachmentCover, idBoard, idChecklists, idLabels, idList, idMembers, idMembersVoted, idShort, labels, manualCoverAttachment, name, pos, shortLink, shortUrl, subscribed, url.

list_fields.title: List Fields
list_fields.description: Specifies the fields to return for list objects. Use 'all' or a comma-separated list: closed, idBoard, name, pos, subscribed.

memberships.title: Memberships
memberships.description: Filters board memberships to return. Use 'all' or a comma-separated list of types: active, admin, deactivated, me, normal.

label_fields.title: Label Fields
label_fields.description: Specifies the fields to return for label objects. Use 'all' or a comma-separated list: color, idBoard, name, uses.

labels_limit.title: Labels Limit
labels_limit.description: The maximum number of labels to return, ranging from 0 to 1000.

organization.title: Organization
organization.description: Determines whether to include the organization object to which the board belongs. Set to 'true' or 'false'.

action_fields.title: Action Fields
action_fields.description: Specifies the fields to return for action objects. Use 'all' or a comma-separated list of fields: data, date, idMemberCreator, type.

action_member.title: Action Member
action_member.description: Determines whether to include the member object within actions. Set to 'true' or 'false'.

actions_limit.title: Actions Limit
actions_limit.description: The maximum number of actions to return, ranging from 0 to 1000.

actions_since.title: Actions Since
actions_since.description: Filters actions to those that occurred after a specific date (ISO 8601 format), or 'lastView'. Use null for no date filtering.

card_stickers.title: Card Stickers
card_stickers.description: Determines whether to include stickers on cards. Set to 'true' or 'false'.

member_fields.title: Member Fields
member_fields.default: avatarHash, initials, fullName, username and confirmed
member_fields.description: Specifies fields for member objects. Use 'all' or a comma-separated list. Valid fields: avatarHash, bio, bioData, confirmed, fullName, idPremOrgsAdmin, initials, memberType, products, status, url, username.

actions_format.title: Actions Format
actions_format.description: Specifies the format for returned actions. Valid values: 'count', 'list', or 'minimal'.

membersInvited.title: Members Invited
membersInvited.description: Filters invited members of the board. Valid values: 'admins', 'all', 'none', 'normal', or 'owners'.

actions_display.title: Actions Display
actions_display.description: Determines whether to return display objects for actions. Set to 'true' or 'false'.

card_checklists.title: Card Checklists
card_checklists.description: Filters the checklists on cards to be returned. Valid values: 'all' or 'none'.

actions_entities.title: Actions Entities
actions_entities.description: Determines whether to return entity objects for actions. Set to 'true' or 'false'.

card_attachments.title: Card Attachments
card_attachments.description: Determines whether to include card attachments. Set to 'true', 'false', or 'cover' (for only card cover attachments).

checklist_fields.title: Checklist Fields
checklist_fields.description: Specifies fields for board-level checklist objects. Use 'all' or a comma-separated list: idBoard, idCard, name, pos.

memberships_member.title: Memberships Member
memberships_member.description: Determines whether to include member objects within memberships. Set to 'true' or 'false'.

organization_fields.title: Organization Fields
organization_fields.description: Specifies fields for the organization object. Use 'all' or a comma-separated list. Valid fields: billableMemberCount, desc, descData, displayName, idBoards, invitations, invited, logoHash, memberships, name, powerUps, prefs, premiumFeatures, products, url, website.

action_memberCreator.title: Action Member Creator
action_memberCreator.description: Determines whether to include the member creator object within actions. Set to 'true' or 'false'.

action_member_fields.title: Action Member Fields
action_member_fields.description: Specifies the fields to return for member objects within actions. Use 'all' or a comma-separated list. Valid fields: avatarHash, bio, bioData, confirmed, fullName, idPremOrgsAdmin, initials, memberType, products, status, url, username.

membersInvited_fields.title: Members Invited Fields
membersInvited_fields.description: Specifies fields for invited member objects. Use 'all' or a comma-separated list. Valid fields: avatarHash, bio, bioData, confirmed, fullName, idPremOrgsAdmin, initials, memberType, products, status, url, username.

card_attachment_fields.title: Card Attachment Fields
card_attachment_fields.description: Specifies the fields to return for card attachment objects. Use 'all' or a comma-separated list. Valid fields: bytes, date, edgeColor, idMember, isUpload, mimeType, name, previews, url.

organization_memberships.title: Organization Memberships
organization_memberships.description: Filters organization memberships to return. Use 'all' or a comma-separated list: active, admin, deactivated, me, normal.

memberships_member_fields.title: Memberships Member Fields
memberships_member_fields.description: Specifies fields for member objects within memberships. Use 'all' or a comma-separated list. Valid fields: avatarHash, bio, bioData, confirmed, fullName, idPremOrgsAdmin, initials, memberType, products, status, url, username.

action_memberCreator_fields.title: Action Member Creator Fields
action_memberCreator_fields.description: Specifies the fields to return for member creator objects within actions. Use 'all' or a comma-separated list. Valid fields: avatarHash, bio, bioData, confirmed, fullName, idPremOrgsAdmin, initials, memberType, products, status, url, username.

tools.name: TRELLO_GET_CARDS_ACTIONS_BY_ID_CARD
tools.description: Retrieves the history of actions (e.g., comments, updates, moves) for a Trello card specified by `idCard`; the card must exist and very old actions might not be available.

page.title: Page
page.description: The page number of results to retrieve, starting from 0. Used for pagination. Note: `page * limit` must be less than 1000.

limit.title: Limit
limit.description: The maximum number of actions to return. Must be a number between 0 and 1000.

since.title: Since
since.description: A date in ISO 8601 format (e.g., '2023-01-15T10:00:00Z'), 'null', or 'lastView'. Returns actions that occurred after this date/event. 'lastView' refers to the time the user last viewed the card.

before.title: Before
before.description: A date in ISO 8601 format (e.g., '2023-12-31T23:59:59Z'), or 'null'. Returns actions that occurred before this date.

fields.title: Fields
fields.description: A comma-separated list of fields to include for each action, or 'all'. Valid fields: data, date, idMemberCreator, type.

filter.title: Filter
filter.description: A comma-separated list of action types to filter by (e.g., 'commentCard,updateCard:idList'), or 'all'. Valid action types are: addAttachmentToCard, addChecklistToCard, addMemberToBoard, addMemberToCard, addMemberToOrganization, addToOrganizationBoard, commentCard, convertToCardFromCheckItem, copyBoard, copyCard, copyCommentCard, createBoard, createCard, createList, createOrganization, deleteAttachmentFromCard, deleteBoardInvitation, deleteCard, deleteOrganizationInvitation, disablePowerUp, emailCard, enablePowerUp, makeAdminOfBoard, makeNormalMemberOfBoard, makeNormalMemberOfOrganization, makeObserverOfBoard, memberJoinedTrello, moveCardFromBoard, moveCardToBoard, moveListFromBoard, moveListToBoard, removeChecklistFromCard, removeFromOrganizationBoard, removeMemberFromCard, unconfirmedBoardInvitation, unconfirmedOrganizationInvitation, updateBoard, updateCard, updateCard:closed, updateCard:desc, updateCard:idList, updateCard:name, updateCheckItemStateOnCard, updateChecklist, updateList, updateList:closed, updateList:name, updateMember, or updateOrganization.

format.title: Format
format.description: The format of the response. 'list' returns a list of actions, 'minimal' returns a minimal list of actions, and 'count' returns only the total number of actions.

idCard.title: Id Card
idCard.description: The ID or shortLink of the card for which to retrieve actions.

member.title: Member
member.description: Determines whether to include details of the member who performed the action. Provide as a string 'true' or 'false'.

display.title: Display
display.description: Determines whether to return display-related information for the actions. Provide as a string 'true' or 'false'.

entities.title: Entities
entities.description: Determines whether to return information about entities (e.g., comments, checklists) associated with the actions. Provide as a string 'true' or 'false'.

idModels.title: Id Models
idModels.description: A comma-separated list of model IDs. If provided, only actions related to these specific model IDs (e.g., a specific checklist item ID if an action is 'updateCheckItemStateOnCard') will be returned.

memberCreator.title: Member Creator
memberCreator.description: Determines whether to include details of the member who created the action (the action's author). Provide as a string 'true' or 'false'.

member_fields.title: Member Fields
member_fields.description: A comma-separated list of fields to return for the member object, if 'member' is 'true'. Valid fields include: avatarHash, bio, bioData, confirmed, fullName, idPremOrgsAdmin, initials, memberType, products, status, url, or username. Use 'all' to retrieve all fields.

memberCreator_fields.title: Member Creator Fields
memberCreator_fields.description: A comma-separated list of fields to return for the memberCreator object, if 'memberCreator' is 'true'. Valid fields include: avatarHash, bio, bioData, confirmed, fullName, idPremOrgsAdmin, initials, memberType, products, status, url, or username. Use 'all' to retrieve all fields.

tools.description: Retrieves the Trello organization linked to a specific notification ID; returns organization details only, not the notification itself.

fields.title: Fields
fields.description: Organization fields to return. Accepts 'all' or a comma-separated list of specific fields (e.g., 'displayName,url'). Allowed fields: billableMemberCount, desc, descData, displayName, idBoards, invitations, invited, logoHash, memberships, name, powerUps, prefs, premiumFeatures, products, url, website.

idNotification.title: Id Notification
idNotification.description: The unique identifier of the notification for which organization details are being requested.

tools.name: TRELLO_GET_ORGANIZATIONS_ACTIONS_BY_ID_ORG
tools.description: Retrieves a log of actions (e.g., card creations, list movements, comments) for a specified Trello organization, filterable by type, date range, and models; `idOrg` must be a valid organization ID/name, and `page` * `limit` must be < 1000.

page.title: Page
page.description: Page number of results to retrieve (0-indexed).

idOrg.title: Id Org
idOrg.description: The ID or name of the Trello organization.

limit.title: Limit
limit.description: Maximum number of actions to return (0-1000).

since.title: Since
since.description: Starting point for actions. Can be a specific date (ISO 8601 format or Unix timestamp in milliseconds), 'lastView', or null (actions from the beginning).

before.title: Before
before.description: Ending point for actions. Can be a specific date (ISO 8601 format or Unix timestamp in milliseconds) or null (actions up to the most recent).

fields.title: Fields
fields.description: Specifies the fields to be returned for each action. Use 'all' or a comma-separated list of specific field names. Allowed fields: `data`, `date`, `idMemberCreator`, `type`.

filter.title: Filter
filter.description: Filters actions by type. Use 'all' or a comma-separated list of specific action types (e.g., `addAttachmentToCard`, `commentCard`). For a full list of allowed types, refer to the Trello API documentation.

format.title: Format
format.description: The format of the returned actions. Allowed values: 'count', 'list', or 'minimal'.

member.title: Member
member.description: Indicates whether to return information for the member who performed the action.

display.title: Display
display.description: Indicates whether to return display-friendly information for an action (e.g., human-readable strings).

entities.title: Entities
entities.description: Indicates whether to return information about entities (e.g., card, board, list) associated with an action.

idModels.title: Id Models
idModels.description: A comma-separated list of Trello model IDs (e.g., card IDs, board IDs, list IDs) to filter actions by.

memberCreator.title: Member Creator
memberCreator.description: Indicates whether to return information for the action creator (usually the same as the member).

member_fields.title: Member Fields
member_fields.description: Fields for the 'member' object if 'member' is true. Use 'all' or a comma-separated list from: avatarHash, bio, bioData, confirmed, fullName, idPremOrgsAdmin, initials, memberType, products, status, url, username.

memberCreator_fields.title: Member Creator Fields
memberCreator_fields.description: Fields for the 'memberCreator' object if 'memberCreator' is true. Use 'all' or a comma-separated list from: avatarHash, bio, bioData, confirmed, fullName, idPremOrgsAdmin, initials, memberType, products, status, url, username.

tools.name: TRELLO_GET_ORGANIZATIONS_BOARDS_BY_ID_ORG
tools.description: Fetches boards for a Trello organization, specified by its ID or name, with options to filter and customize returned data.

idOrg.title: Id Org
idOrg.description: The ID or name of the organization to retrieve boards from.

fields.title: Fields
fields.description: Fields for boards. Use 'all' or a comma-separated list: 'closed', 'dateLastActivity', 'dateLastView', 'desc', 'descData', 'idOrganization', 'invitations', 'invited', 'labelNames', 'memberships', 'name', 'pinned', 'powerUps', 'prefs', 'shortLink', 'shortUrl', 'starred', 'subscribed', 'url'.

filter.title: Filter
filter.description: Filters boards. Use 'all' or a comma-separated list: 'closed', 'members', 'open', 'organization', 'pinned', 'public', 'starred', 'unpinned'.

actions.title: Actions
actions.description: Actions for boards. Use 'all' or a comma-separated list: 'addAttachmentToCard', 'addChecklistToCard', 'addMemberToBoard', 'addMemberToCard', 'addMemberToOrganization', 'addToOrganizationBoard', 'commentCard', 'convertToCardFromCheckItem', 'copyBoard', 'copyCard', 'copyCommentCard', 'createBoard', 'createCard', 'createList', 'createOrganization', 'deleteAttachmentFromCard', 'deleteBoardInvitation', 'deleteCard', 'deleteOrganizationInvitation', 'disablePowerUp', 'emailCard', 'enablePowerUp', 'makeAdminOfBoard', 'makeNormalMemberOfBoard', 'makeNormalMemberOfOrganization', 'makeObserverOfBoard', 'memberJoinedTrello', 'moveCardFromBoard', 'moveCardToBoard', 'moveListFromBoard', 'moveListToBoard', 'removeChecklistFromCard', 'removeFromOrganizationBoard', 'removeMemberFromCard', 'unconfirmedBoardInvitation', 'unconfirmedOrganizationInvitation', 'updateBoard', 'updateCard', 'updateCard:closed', 'updateCard:desc', 'updateCard:idList', 'updateCard:name', 'updateCheckItemStateOnCard', 'updateChecklist', 'updateList', 'updateList:closed', 'updateList:name', 'updateMember', 'updateOrganization'.

memberships.title: Memberships
memberships.description: Board memberships. Use 'all', 'none', or a comma-separated list: 'active', 'admin', 'deactivated', 'me', 'normal'.

organization.title: Organization
organization.description: Include organization object with boards. 'true' or 'false'.

action_fields.title: Action Fields
action_fields.description: Fields for actions. Use 'all' or a comma-separated list: 'data', 'date', 'idMemberCreator', 'type'.

actions_entities.title: Actions Entities
actions_entities.description: Include entities (e.g., card, board, member) in action data. 'true' or 'false'.

organization_fields.title: Organization Fields
organization_fields.description: Fields for the organization if 'organization=true'. Use 'all' or a comma-separated list: 'billableMemberCount', 'desc', 'descData', 'displayName', 'idBoards', 'invitations', 'invited', 'logoHash', 'memberships', 'name', 'powerUps', 'prefs', 'premiumFeatures', 'products', 'url', 'website'.

tools.name: TRELLO_GET_ORGANIZATIONS_BOARDS_BY_ID_ORG_BY_FILTER
tools.description: Fetches a list of boards belonging to a specific Trello organization, filtered by a given criterion.

idOrg.title: Id Org
idOrg.description: The ID or unique name of the Trello organization.

filter.title: Filter
filter.description: Filter criteria to select a subset of boards. Valid filters include 'all', 'open', 'closed', 'public', 'private', 'starred', and 'members'.

tools.name: TRELLO_GET_ORGANIZATIONS_BY_ID_ORG
tools.description: Retrieves detailed information about a specific Trello organization, including optional related resources like members, boards, and actions, using its ID or unique name.

idOrg.title: Id Org
idOrg.description: The ID or unique name of the Trello organization to retrieve.

boards.title: Boards
boards.description: Filters the boards to return. Use 'all' or provide a comma-separated list of board states/types: closed, members, open, organization, pinned, public, starred, or unpinned.

fields.title: Fields
fields.default: name, displayName, desc, descData, url, website, logoHash, products and powerUps
fields.description: Specifies the fields to return for the organization itself. Use 'all' or provide a comma-separated list of field names: billableMemberCount, desc, descData, displayName, idBoards, invitations, invited, logoHash, memberships, name, powerUps, prefs, premiumFeatures, products, url, or website.

actions.title: Actions
actions.description: Comma-separated list of action types (e.g., 'addMemberToBoard', 'createCard', 'updateOrganization') or 'all'. For a full list of types, consult the Trello API documentation. If not provided, Trello's default behavior applies.

members.title: Members
members.description: Filters which members of the organization to return. Valid values: 'admins', 'all', 'none', 'normal', 'owners'.

board_lists.title: Board Lists
board_lists.description: Filters the lists to be returned for each board. Valid values: 'all', 'closed', 'none', 'open'.

memberships.title: Memberships
memberships.description: Filters the memberships to return. Use 'all' or provide a comma-separated list of membership types: active, admin, deactivated, me, or normal.

board_fields.title: Board Fields
board_fields.description: Specifies the fields to return for each board. Use 'all' or provide a comma-separated list of field names: closed, dateLastActivity, dateLastView, desc, descData, idOrganization, invitations, invited, labelNames, memberships, name, pinned, powerUps, prefs, shortLink, shortUrl, starred, subscribed, or url.

paid_account.title: Paid Account
paid_account.description: Include organization's paid account status. Valid: 'true', 'false'. If not provided, this info is typically not included.

action_fields.title: Action Fields
action_fields.description: Specifies the fields to return for each action. Use 'all' or provide a comma-separated list of field names: data, date, idMemberCreator, or type.

actions_limit.title: Actions Limit
actions_limit.description: The maximum number of actions to return. Must be a number between 0 and 1000.

board_actions.title: Board Actions
board_actions.description: Comma-separated list of board action types (e.g., 'addAttachmentToCard', 'updateBoard') or 'all', specific to board actions. For a full list, consult the Trello API documentation. If not provided, Trello's default behavior applies.

member_fields.title: Member Fields
member_fields.default: avatarHash, fullName, initials, username and confirmed
member_fields.description: Specifies the fields to return for each member. Use 'all' or provide a comma-separated list of field names: avatarHash, bio, bioData, confirmed, fullName, idPremOrgsAdmin, initials, memberType, products, status, url, or username.

membersInvited.title: Members Invited
membersInvited.description: Filters which invited (pending) members of the organization to return. Valid values: 'admins', 'all', 'none', 'normal', 'owners'.

actions_display.title: Actions Display
actions_display.description: Include a 'display' object with rendering info for each action. Valid: 'true', 'false'. If not provided, display info is typically not included.

member_activity.title: Member Activity
member_activity.description: Include member activity data (Trello Premium organizations only). Valid: 'true', 'false'. If not provided, activity is typically not included.

actions_entities.title: Actions Entities
actions_entities.description: Include an 'entities' object with details for each action. Valid: 'true', 'false'. If not provided, entities are typically not included.

memberships_member.title: Memberships Member
memberships_member.description: Include the member object for each membership. Valid: 'true', 'false'. If not provided, member objects are typically not included.

board_action_fields.title: Board Action Fields
board_action_fields.description: Specifies the fields to return for each board action. Use 'all' or provide a comma-separated list of field names: data, date, idMemberCreator, or type.

board_actions_limit.title: Board Actions Limit
board_actions_limit.description: The maximum number of board actions to return. Must be a number between 0 and 1000.

board_actions_since.title: Board Actions Since
board_actions_since.description: Retrieve board actions after a specific ISO 8601 date/time, 'null', or 'lastView'. If not provided, recent actions are typically returned.

board_actions_format.title: Board Actions Format
board_actions_format.description: Specifies the format for returning board actions. Valid values: 'count', 'list', 'minimal'.

board_actions_display.title: Board Actions Display
board_actions_display.description: Include a 'display' object for board actions. Valid: 'true', 'false'. If not provided, display info is typically not included.

membersInvited_fields.title: Members Invited Fields
membersInvited_fields.description: Specifies the fields to return for each invited member. Use 'all' or provide a comma-separated list of field names: avatarHash, bio, bioData, confirmed, fullName, idPremOrgsAdmin, initials, memberType, products, status, url, or username.

board_actions_entities.title: Board Actions Entities
board_actions_entities.description: Include an 'entities' object with details for board actions. Valid: 'true', 'false'. If not provided, entities are typically not included.

memberships_member_fields.title: Memberships Member Fields
memberships_member_fields.description: Specifies the member fields to return for memberships. Use 'all' or provide a comma-separated list of field names: avatarHash, bio, bioData, confirmed, fullName, idPremOrgsAdmin, initials, memberType, products, status, url, or username.

tools.name: TRELLO_GET_ORGANIZATIONS_BY_ID_ORG_BY_FIELD
tools.description: Retrieves the value of a single specified `field` for a Trello organization `idOrg`, ideal for efficiently fetching a specific piece of information without loading the full organization details.

field.title: Field
field.description: The specific field to retrieve from the organization. Refer to Trello API documentation for a comprehensive list of valid fields.

idOrg.title: Id Org
idOrg.description: The ID or name of the Trello organization.

tools.name: TRELLO_GET_ORGANIZATIONS_DELTAS_BY_ID_ORG
tools.description: Retrieves a log of recent modifications (deltas) for a Trello organization, filterable by tags and supporting incremental fetching via an update index.

tags.title: Tags
tags.description: A valid tag for subscribing to delta updates, filtering the type of changes returned.

idOrg.title: Id Org
idOrg.description: The ID or name of the Trello organization.

ixLastUpdate.title: Ix Last Update
ixLastUpdate.description: Index of the last update received for fetching subsequent changes; use -1 to retrieve all changes since the beginning.

tools.name: TRELLO_GET_ORGANIZATIONS_MEMBERS_BY_ID_ORG
tools.description: Retrieves members of a Trello organization (specified by ID or name), with an option to include member activity if the organization is Premium.

idOrg.title: Id Org
idOrg.description: The ID or name of the organization to retrieve members from.

fields.title: Fields
fields.description: Specifies which member fields to return. Use 'all' to include all available fields, or provide a comma-separated list of specific fields. Available fields: avatarHash, bio, bioData, confirmed, fullName, idPremOrgsAdmin, initials, memberType, products, status, url, username.

filter.title: Filter
filter.description: Determines which types of members to include in the response. 'admins' for administrators, 'all' for every member, 'none' for no members (useful for checking organization existence or permissions), 'normal' for regular members (excluding admins), 'owners' for organization owners.

activity.title: Activity
activity.description: Set to 'true' to include member activity information. This option is only available for Premium organizations. Defaults to 'false' if not specified.

tools.name: TRELLO_GET_ORGANIZATIONS_MEMBERS_BY_ID_ORG_BY_FILTER
tools.description: Fetches members of a specified Trello organization using a filter like 'all', 'normal', 'admins', or 'owners'.

idOrg.title: Id Org
idOrg.description: The ID or name of the Trello organization.

filter.title: Filter
filter.description: Filter for members. Common values: 'all', 'normal' (regular members), 'admins' (administrators), 'owners'.

tools.name: TRELLO_GET_ORGANIZATIONS_MEMBERS_CARDS_BY_ID_ORG_BY_ID_MEMBER
tools.description: Fetches all cards assigned to a specific member of a given Trello organization.

inputSchema.title: GetOrganizationsMembersCardsByIdOrgByIdMemberRequest

list.title: List
list.description: Indicates whether to include the list object to which the card belongs. Accepts 'true' or 'false'.

board.title: Board
board.description: Indicates whether to include the board object to which the card belongs. Accepts 'true' or 'false'.

idOrg.title: Id Org
idOrg.description: The ID or name of the Trello organization.

fields.title: Fields
fields.description: Specifies which card fields to include in the response. Accepts 'all' or a comma-separated list of valid card fields: badges, checkItemStates, closed, dateLastActivity, desc, descData, due, email, idAttachmentCover, idBoard, idChecklists, idLabels, idList, idMembers, idMembersVoted, idShort, labels, manualCoverAttachment, name, pos, shortLink, shortUrl, subscribed or url.

filter.title: Filter
filter.description: Filters the cards to retrieve. Allowed values are 'all', 'closed', 'none', 'open', or 'visible'.

actions.title: Actions
actions.description: Filters actions on the cards. Accepts 'all' or a comma-separated list of action types. Valid types include: addAttachmentToCard, addChecklistToCard, addMemberToBoard, addMemberToCard, addMemberToOrganization, addToOrganizationBoard, commentCard, convertToCardFromCheckItem, copyBoard, copyCard, copyCommentCard, createBoard, createCard, createList, createOrganization, deleteAttachmentFromCard, deleteBoardInvitation, deleteCard, deleteOrganizationInvitation, disablePowerUp, emailCard, enablePowerUp, makeAdminOfBoard, makeNormalMemberOfBoard, makeNormalMemberOfOrganization, makeObserverOfBoard, memberJoinedTrello, moveCardFromBoard, moveCardToBoard, moveListFromBoard, moveListToBoard, removeChecklistFromCard, removeFromOrganizationBoard, removeMemberFromCard, unconfirmedBoardInvitation, unconfirmedOrganizationInvitation, updateBoard, updateCard, updateCard:closed, updateCard:desc, updateCard:idList, updateCard:name, updateCheckItemStateOnCard, updateChecklist, updateList, updateList:closed, updateList:name, updateMember or updateOrganization.

members.title: Members
members.description: Indicates whether to include member data on the cards. Accepts 'true' or 'false'.

idMember.title: Id Member
idMember.description: The ID of the member whose cards are to be retrieved.

checklists.title: Checklists
checklists.description: Determines whether to include checklists on the cards. Accepts 'all' or 'none'.

attachments.title: Attachments
attachments.description: Determines whether to include attachments. Accepts a boolean string ('true'/'false') or 'cover' to only include card cover attachments.

list_fields.title: List Fields
list_fields.description: Specifies which list fields to include if 'list' is 'true'. Accepts 'all' or a comma-separated list of valid fields: closed, idBoard, name, pos or subscribed.

board_fields.title: Board Fields
board_fields.default: name, desc, closed, idOrganization, pinned, url and prefs
board_fields.description: Specifies which board fields to include if 'board' is 'true'. Accepts 'all' or a comma-separated list of valid fields: closed, dateLastActivity, dateLastView, desc, descData, idOrganization, invitations, invited, labelNames, memberships, name, pinned, powerUps, prefs, shortLink, shortUrl, starred, subscribed or url.

member_fields.title: Member Fields
member_fields.description: Specifies which member fields to include if 'members' is 'true'. Accepts 'all' or a comma-separated list of valid fields: avatarHash, bio, bioData, confirmed, fullName, idPremOrgsAdmin, initials, memberType, products, status, url or username.

checkItemStates.title: Check Item States
checkItemStates.description: Indicates whether to include check item states on the cards. Accepts 'true' or 'false'.

attachment_fields.title: Attachment Fields
attachment_fields.description: Specifies which attachment fields to include if attachments are retrieved. Accepts 'all' or a comma-separated list of valid fields: bytes, date, edgeColor, idMember, isUpload, mimeType, name, previews or url.

inputSchema.description: Request schema for retrieving cards of a specific member within an organization.

tools.name: TRELLO_GET_ORGANIZATIONS_MEMBERSHIPS_BY_ID_ORG
tools.description: Fetches organization-level memberships for a Trello organization, with options to filter members and include their details; does not return board-specific memberships.

inputSchema.title: GetOrganizationsMembershipsByIdOrgRequest

idOrg.title: Id Org
idOrg.description: The unique identifier (ID) or name of the Trello organization for which to retrieve memberships.

filter.title: Filter
filter.description: Filters the list of memberships. Accepts 'all' or a comma-separated list of types: 'active', 'admin', 'deactivated', 'me', 'normal'.

member.title: Member
member.description: Specifies whether to retrieve full member objects. Set to 'true' to include, 'false' to exclude. If omitted, Trello defaults to 'false' (excluding details).

member_fields.title: Member Fields
member_fields.description: If 'member' is 'true', specifies a comma-separated list of member fields to return (e.g., 'fullName,username' or 'all'). Allowed fields: avatarHash, bio, bioData, confirmed, fullName, idPremOrgsAdmin, initials, memberType, products, status, url, username.

inputSchema.description: Request schema for fetching memberships of a Trello organization.

tools.name: TRELLO_GET_ORGANIZATIONS_MEMBERSHIPS_BY_ID_ORG_BY_ID_MEMBERSHIP
tools.description: Retrieves a specific membership within a Trello organization, using their respective IDs, to ascertain the member's role, status, or permissions.

inputSchema.title: GetOrganizationsMembershipsByIdOrgByIdMembershipRequest

idOrg.title: Id Org
idOrg.description: The ID of the organization.

member.title: Member
member.description: Determines whether to include the member object in the response. Valid values are 'true' or 'false'.

idMembership.title: Id Membership
idMembership.description: The ID of the membership to retrieve.

member_fields.title: Member Fields
member_fields.description: Comma-separated list of fields for the member object. Valid values: 'all', 'avatarHash', 'bio', 'bioData', 'confirmed', 'fullName', 'idPremOrgsAdmin', 'initials', 'memberType', 'products', 'status', 'url', 'username'.

inputSchema.description: Request schema for retrieving a specific membership of an organization.

tools.name: TRELLO_GET_ORGANIZATIONS_MEMBERS_INVITED_BY_ID_ORG
tools.description: Retrieves members invited to a Trello organization who have not yet accepted their invitation, returning only data for pending invitations (not active or former members) and cannot send or modify invitations.

idOrg.title: Id Org
idOrg.description: The ID or name of the Trello organization. Using the organization's unique ID is generally more reliable.

fields.title: Fields
fields.description: Determines the set of fields to be returned for each invited member. Specify 'all' to include all available fields, or provide a comma-separated list of desired fields. Valid fields include: avatarHash, avatarSource, bio, bioData, confirmed, email, fullName, gravatarHash, idBoards, idBoardsPinned, idOrganizations, idPremOrgsAdmin, initials, loginTypes, memberType, oneTimeMessagesDismissed, prefs, premiumFeatures, products, status, trophies, uploadedAvatarHash, url, or username.

tools.name: TRELLO_GET_ORGANIZATIONS_MEMBERS_INVITED_BY_ID_ORG_BY_FIELD
tools.description: Retrieves a specific `field` (e.g., fullName, username, email, status) for members with pending invitations to the Trello organization specified by `idOrg`.

field.title: Field
field.description: The specific field of an invited member to retrieve. This refers to an attribute of the invited member object.

idOrg.title: Id Org
idOrg.description: The ID or name of the Trello organization.

tools.name: TRELLO_GET_SEARCH
tools.description: Searches Trello content (e.g., boards, cards, members) within specified organizations using a query and customizable result fields.

inputSchema.title: GetSearchRequest

query.title: Query
query.description: The search query string. Must be between 1 and 16384 characters long.

idCards.title: Id Cards
idCards.description: A comma-separated list of card IDs to search for.

partial.title: Partial
partial.description: Whether to enable partial matching for the search query ('true' or 'false').

idBoards.title: Id Boards
idBoards.description: A comma-separated list of board IDs to search within. Default is 'mine' (boards the user is a member of).

card_list.title: Card List
card_list.description: Whether to include the list object for each card returned ('true' or 'false').

card_board.title: Card Board
card_board.description: Whether to include the board object for each card returned ('true' or 'false').

cards_page.title: Cards Page
cards_page.description: Page number for paginated card results. Must be 0-100. Default is 0.

modelTypes.title: Model Types
modelTypes.description: Types of Trello objects to search (e.g., 'cards,boards' or 'all' from 'actions', 'boards', 'cards', 'members', 'organizations'). Default is 'all'.

card_fields.title: Card Fields
card_fields.description: Fields for found cards; 'all' or a comma-separated list (e.g., 'name,due'). Default is 'all'.

cards_limit.title: Cards Limit
cards_limit.description: Maximum number of card results. Must be 1-1000. Default is 1.

board_fields.title: Board Fields
board_fields.description: Fields for found boards; 'all' or a comma-separated list (e.g., 'name,url'). Default is 'name and idOrganization'.

boards_limit.title: Boards Limit
boards_limit.description: Maximum number of board results. Must be 1-1000. Default is 1.

card_members.title: Card Members
card_members.description: Whether to include member objects for each card returned ('true' or 'false').

card_stickers.title: Card Stickers
card_stickers.description: Whether to include sticker objects for each card returned ('true' or 'false').

member_fields.title: Member Fields
member_fields.default: avatarHash, fullName, initials, username and confirmed
member_fields.description: Fields for found members; 'all' or a comma-separated list (e.g., 'fullName,username'). Default is 'avatarHash, fullName, initials, username and confirmed'.

members_limit.title: Members Limit
members_limit.description: Maximum number of member results. Must be 1-1000. Default is 10.

idOrganizations.title: Id Organizations
idOrganizations.description: A comma-separated list of organization IDs to search within. This field is required.

card_attachments.title: Card Attachments
card_attachments.description: Whether to include attachments for cards ('true', 'false', or 'cover' for card cover attachments).

organization_fields.title: Organization Fields
organization_fields.description: Fields for found organizations; 'all' or a comma-separated list (e.g., 'name,url'). Default is 'name and displayName'.

organizations_limit.title: Organizations Limit
organizations_limit.description: Maximum number of organization results. Must be 1-1000. Default is 10.

inputSchema.description: Request schema for `GetSearch` action. Defines the parameters for searching Trello content.
